page.title: 05Hawkinge Primary School
page.content: Hawkinge County Primary School was established in 1879 with a roll of 19 children. As the village has developed so the number of children has increased and there are at present over 200 children in attendance.The catchment area of the school includes the Parishes of Hawkinge,Acrise,Swingfield,Densole and Paddlesworth. The school building has rather evolved over the years,the original building being extended in the 1930s,the 1950s and again in the early 1960s.The building contains 7 classrooms,a hall,a kitchen and administrative offices. The school uniform is maroon and blue. The Head Teacher is Mr.D.J.Curtis. The school motto is "Aim High".
